00035 size_t TableIdentifier::encoded_length() const {
00036   return 8 + encoded_length_vstr(name);
00037 }
00038 
00039 void TableIdentifier::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00040   encode_vstr(bufp, name);
00041   encode_i32(bufp, id);
00042   encode_i32(bufp, generation);
00043 }
00044 
00045 void TableIdentifier::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00046   HT_TRY("decoding table identitier",
00047     name = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00048     id = decode_i32(bufp, remainp);
00049     generation = decode_i32(bufp, remainp));
00050 }
00051 
00052 size_t RangeSpec::encoded_length() const {
00053   return encoded_length_vstr(start_row) + encoded_length_vstr(end_row);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void RangeSpec::encode(uint8_t **bufp) const {
00057   encode_vstr(bufp, start_row);
00058   encode_vstr(bufp, end_row);
00059 }
00060 
00061 void RangeSpec::decode(const uint8_t **bufp, size_t *remainp) {
00062   HT_TRY("decoding range spec",
00063     start_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp);
00064     end_row = decode_vstr(bufp, remainp));
00065 }

00068 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const TableIdentifier &tid) {
00069   os <<"{TableIdentifier: name='"<< tid.name <<"' id='" << tid.id
00070      <<"' generation='"<< tid.generation <<"'}";
00071   return os;
00072 }
00073 
00074 ostream &Hypertable::operator<<(ostream &os, const RangeSpec &range) {
00075   os <<"{RangeSpec:"; 
00076 
00077   if (range.start_row == 0)
00078     os <<" start=[NULL]";
00079   else
00080     os <<" start='"<< range.start_row <<"'";
00081 
00082   if (range.end_row == 0)
00083     os <<" end=[NULL]";
00084   else
00085     os <<" end='"<< range.end_row <<"'";
00086 
00087   os <<'}';
00088   return os;
00089 }
